ARABIC: قَالَ لَقَدْ كُنتُمْ أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُمْ فِى ضَلَٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'You and your fathers are clearly misguided.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He said: "You and your fathers were in clear error."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: "Certainly you and your fathers have all been in manifest error."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He said, "Both you and your fathers have certainly been in error."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Indeed you all – you and your forefathers – were in open error.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Indeed you and your fathers have been in manifest error."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Certainly you have been, (both) you and your fathers, in manifest error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'Then assuredly you and your fathers have been in manifest error.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Verily ye and your fathers were in plain error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Abraham said, "Indeed, you and your fathers have been clearly misguided."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: assuredlY ye, ye and your fathers, have been in error manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Certainly you and your fathers have been in manifest error.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said, "Indeed ye have been in manifest error - ye and your fathers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "Indeed you and your fathers have been in manifest error."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'Truly, you and your fathers are in clear error'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “You and your parents are in evident error.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "You were certainly, you and your fathers, in manifest error."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:54] He said, to them, ‘Truly you and your fathers, by worshipping them, have been in manifest error’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Abraham said to them: (Verily ye and your fathers) before you (were in plain error) in disbelief and manifest error.
